column3: Would have been quicker to merge instead of adding a tag :-P.\n

I'll cherry-pick the script_error change and leave bitcoinconsensus.h for now.

Merged via 4c83c0e

I'm not sure about this. `bitcoinconsensus.h` is a header that we export as interface. Having the internal directory structure reflected in it makes no sense then.\nEspecially as there is a large chance that it will move around later.\n
It should move to include/bitcoinconsensus.h, instead of being in src/script/, imho.\n
